schedule.description: Pick up your race bib, timing chip, and t-shirt at the main tent
Taco Bell breakfast burritos available for 25K participants
Optional group warm-up led by certified trainers
Diablo distance runners begin their journey
Mild distance - perfect for families and beginners
Taco Bell feast, music, and awards ceremony
Thanks for joining us! See you next year!

packetPickup.preRace: Friday, June 13, 4:00 PM - 7:00 PM at packet pickup location (TBD)

notes: Arrive at least 30 minutes before your race start time
Timing chips must be returned after the race
Water stations available every 2.5K on the course
Medical support available throughout the event
